name: places/ChIJm-Ua-5lZwokRKb1ehT-oo7g
formattedAddress: 50 University Pl # 1, New York, NY 10003, USA
adrFormatAddress: 50 University Pl # 1, New York, NY 10003, USA

originalText.text: It’s a very small drugstore. It is also an unfriendly drugstore. Most recently, the staff has taken to distrusting long-term customers. They peek around the corner when you’re looking at products to see if you might be stealing them. Who wants to be followed with suspicion? They do tend to fill prescriptions quickly when asked. Sometimes, however, the pills are half pills or have parts missing.. They also sometimes send the wrong prescription to peoples homes.. It’s nice to try to support a local pharmacy but the pharmacy should try to support its customers and not treating them as potential shoplifters.

originalText.text:
It’s a shame. I really wanted to like this place and support a small local pharmacy instead of the big chains, but the Pharmacist left me with no other choice.

I have been coming here for months since I moved to the area, and I get very good benefits through my job, which includes a great prescription drug program. One of my medications which I need is a bit pricey, and my insurance makes it extremely cheap for me. I went today to pick up my refills, and the price for my meds was over 6X higher. When I asked about my Rx program, the pharmacist straight up told me “to be frank” that the price is too low for him, and that he’s losing money for what he normally could charge for that medication. And he’s just going to refuse to use my benefits for now on. Then he told me to go to another pharmacy.

A part of me appreciates the blunt honesty, but that’s awful customer service. The pharmacist doesn’t care about the customers or loyalty. He only cares about profit. He flat out told me to get a new pharmacy just because he wasn’t making enough money from me.

originalText.text: I live nearby and I would never use another pharmacy (unless I was out of town) the people are lovely, stellar customer service and they have everything I could ever need. I have even seen big movie stars in there regularly! The beautiful international soap and candles and more make for wonderful gifts. They deliver and are always prompt and super friendly!

originalText.text: wonderful selection of hard to find products. leonor greyl in particular. old time shaving equipment and very friendly staff make this a wonderful stop.

text.text: wonderful selection of hard to find products. leonor greyl in particular. old time shaving equipment and very friendly staff make this a wonderful stop.

originalText.text:
I cannot say enough good things about this place!!!
8years I am still their loyal customer.
They are a small private pharmacy, who treats you respectfully unlike big chain stores.
They work with you if there is any issue (emg. Insurance company acting up they ll call them and fix, and more.in other words I walk in there I feel at home and at ease.
My favorite person there is SHA. I he owns the place and is in charge and is the main pharmacist.
If you were unlucky to walk in there when Sha is out and has this other gentleman filling in for him (tall, grayish hair, italin(? Descent), rude, rude and unhelpful.
He acts like if something is not going thru right away he gets an nasty attitude and acts in convince ced.
At some point if I saw him I walked straight out to return later.
Over time it got little better but he is still either doesn't care or isn't trying to go out of his way to make what needs to happen happen.
He won't even offer a kind word, unlike soft spoken and very competent owner, he is the best in Nyc
They have pleasant staff, except for Carlos, who I used to think was a decent and nice man, until one day he stopped engaging in conversations with me. Just hi Yelena bye... And walks away. I don't belive I did something wrong to him. I have a theory I got older lol, so he lost interest and ceased to be nice lol.

He likes to flirt with young beautiful girls mea while he is a clerk at a pharmacy who isn't anything to look at yet I was surprised to find out he was a shallow. Hal. Lol
Anyways.
This place is good. They have the. Mess u need. They don't give u weird looks if u r there for prescriptions like Adderall or suboxone or Xanax. Unlike so many other pharmacies.
Donno what's wrong with people. Lol
All that is legal and I'm not scamming them yet wall greens and CVS and some private pharmacy like Bigelow refused to service me.
Love Whitney chemist's!
